title: Bear Tooth Theatrepub
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mostly pizza and dairy/meat but also has salads and a Mexican selection, as well a few Asian inspired dishes. Pizza can be ordered without cheese. Offer beer on tap from its own brewing company. Operates an attached movie theater, and you could order to be delivered to your theater table.
